alert.note: Alert for Dallas; Tarrant (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 16 at 9:49AM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Tarrant and western Dallas Counties through 1030 AM CDT... At 948 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Arlington, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Dallas, Fort Worth, Arlington, Irving, Grand Prairie, Carrollton, Flower Mound, Euless, Bedford, Grapevine, Haltom City, Keller, Coppell, Duncanville, Hurst, Farmers Branch, Southlake, Watauga, University Park and Colleyville. This includes the following highways... Interstate 35E between mile markers 418 and 445. Interstate 20 between mile markers 441 and 467. Interstate 30 between mile markers 19 and 46. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
